_schema_desc: Number Counter Template v2.0 - Animated counting number reveal
_usage_desc: Best for: Big number reveals, revenue/metric announcements, key statistics
_chartType_desc: Identifies this as a number counter for the renderer
_value_desc: The target value to count up to
_suffix_desc: Text after the number (e.g., K, M, %, +)
_decimals_desc: Number of decimal places to show
_useLocale_desc: When true, formats with commas (1,250,000 vs 1250000)

dimensions._desc: Canvas dimensions optimized for TikTok 1:1 format

background._desc: Background color. Use #00FF00 for green screen transparency in CapCut.

animation._duration_desc: Animation duration in frames (60 = 2 seconds at 30fps)
animation._linear_desc: Constant speed from start to finish
animation._ease_out_desc: Starts fast, slows down at the end (most satisfying)
animation._ease_in_out_desc: Slow start, fast middle, slow end
animation._delay_desc: Frames to wait before starting the count (for dramatic effect)
